name: Gregory MOTT, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS and Attorney James A. Lammendola, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Mott v. Philadelphia Court of Common Pleas

parties: Gregory MOTT, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS and Attorney James A. Lammendola, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of May, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
91 A.3d 1232
Gregory MOTT, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS and Attorney James A. Lammendola, Respondents.
No. 30 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 7, 2014.
